contributionDescription:
Having chosen several directions: Education, Media, DAO, we created the largest Russian-speaking community of the Optimism ecosystem.
- Education
We created educational courses - Optimism School for aspiring Contributors. These courses include 5+ hours of video material and notes.
- Media 
Organized AMA sessions with the largest RU-media on Telegram (20k followers). Also held local AMAs with the project's ambassadors, and actively developed a Twitter account with 20+ threads.
- DAO: 
 at the time of filling out the application - we are trusted by 93 people with their votes totaling 38k and these numbers are growing every day.

Creators (Discord's names): 
- dragunovski (Ambassador)
- zefirium.eth (Ambassador in training) 
- romstedi (Influencer & DAO creator)

contributionLinks.description: Telegram: AMA with influential RU Influencers: OP, OP Stack & Superchain etc.
Telegram: AMA with a review of the ambassador program
Telegram: AMA with a review of the Superchain
Telegram: AMA with a review of the Optimism ecosystem

impactDescription:
- Collective Governance: at the time of filling out the application - we are trusted by 93 people with their votes totaling 38k and these numbers are growing every day.
- End User Experience & Adoption: AMA sessions with Influencers reaching over 50k users. Creating educational material with over 1k views and writing Twitter posts. 

* CIS - union of nations, comprising 9 countries with a total population of more than 236 millions people
pwFlaggedReason: Flagged: The application is in English but the links and the content provided are mostly in Russian. This violates Rule 11 which states applications must be in English.
pwCategorySuggestions: End-User Experience & Adoption, Community Building, Education
